name: Loop Dun(geons) Dare v0.7
description:
Loop Dun(geons) Dare v0.7

This is for practice purpose  

Topic: 2D,  AI, Roguelite, Upgrade & Mining System, UI & Canvas, Pixel Art.

Team Type : Solo  Time Used on Previous  ver.  : 12+ days  

Old ver.  : https://sunraymanz.itch.io/loop-dungeons-dare-v05

Time Used on This ver.  : 20+ days (estimate)    

------------------ About Game  ------------------

Fight The Endless Battle Simulation, kill enemies and Collect their remains for Upgrade Yourself!
Also if you get kill.....  Don't worry! you will be Respawn like the enemy!!
But not your Base & Turret!!! anyway,no matter you win or lose the game....
some amount your upgrade still with you so you can start a new fight easier then before!

Now with Redesign UI & New Boss & Drop System and much more!!

P.S.Due to it's in prototype stage so gameplay still unbalance.

------------------ How To Play ------------------

WASD : Move 

Space: Jump 

Move Mouse : Aim Left 

Click : shoot bullet

Q : Laser Beam(for mine ore & repair base)

Left SHIFT : Blink

---------------------------------------------------- Thank you for testing my prototype! -SunraymanZ-
